name: BROWSER__RUN_BROWSER_AUTOMATION
description: Runs AI-powered browser automation using browser-use with Steel browser session. Can perform complex web tasks, extract data, fill forms, navigate sites, and interact with web elements intelligently.

task.description: Detailed task description for the AI agent including specific steps, expected outcomes, and any data to extract or actions to perform. Be specific about websites to visit, forms to fill, buttons to click, data to collect, and success criteria. Example: 'Navigate to https://example.com, search for 'AI tools', click on the first result, extract the pricing information from the page, and summarize the key features.'
